parameters.name: ascOrder
parameters.description: Specifies whether to sort the results in ascending order.

parameters.name: orderColumn
parameters.description:
The column to sort by. Valid values:

- submittedAtTime

- waitingTime

- runningAtTime

- runningTime

- snapshotTime

- totalTime

- cpuUsage

- memoryUsage

- minCpuPct

- minMemoryPct

- priority

- cpuRequest

- memoryRequest

- cpuUsageToRequestRatio

- memoryUsageToRequestRatio

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: The tenant ID. To view the tenant ID, log on to the MaxCompute console. In the navigation pane on the left, choose Tenant Management > Tenant Properties.
